summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2561, for the improvement of 46th Avenue South, from Ferdinand Street to Orcas Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 29731 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
